turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Good evening. Yes, I want to order a cup of coffee from Starbucks espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need Espresso coffee, a cup of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and where would you like that picked up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's an esspresso from the starbucks on 55 Grove Street right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I think I will need whipped cream and the extra honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Espressos don't use whipped cream and you can add honey yourself at the starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The sugar is also on the counter by the pickup area for starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, it'll give me a review of my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You ordered an espresso from the starbucks on 55 Grove street. Your order will be ready in 5 minutes and you'll get a receipt via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem have a great day.
